nodes.text: The Suppressor was an Imperial Gozanti-class cruiser that was in service to the Imperial Navy during the Imperial Era. At one point, it flew over a rocky, tan terrestrial body alongside a TIE fighter.

The Suppressor was first mentioned on a card of the same name in the Imperial Assault Carrier Expansion Pack, a 2015 release for Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game. The card was illustrated by Ben Zweifel.
